ButtonAction.cannotLoadDirectoryDialogMessageText: Cannot load a Directory, please select a valid file.

UpdateCheckerDialog.updateCheckerDialogText1: Would you like to update now?

DebugConsoleWindow.savedSuccessDialogMessage: Saved debug console to file at:

MacOSOptionsPanel.macAppCategoryLabelText: String used to construct LSApplicationCategoryType in application plist:
MacOSOptionsPanel.macAppStoreLabelText: Indicates that the jpackage output is intended for the Mac App Store:
MacOSOptionsPanel.macEntitlementsLabelText: Path to file containing entitlements to use:
MacOSOptionsPanel.macPackageIdentifierLabelText: An identifier that uniquely identifies the application for macOS:
MacOSOptionsPanel.macPackageNameLabelText: Name of the application as it appears in the Menu Bar:
MacOSOptionsPanel.macSignLabelText: Request that the package be signed:
MacOSOptionsPanel.macSigningKeyUserNameLabelText: Team or username portion in Apple signing identities:
MacOSOptionsPanel.macSigningKeychainLabelText: Name of the keychain to search for the signing identity:

UnixOptionsPanel.linuxAppCategoryLabelText: Group value of the RPM /.spec file or Section value of DEB control file:
UnixOptionsPanel.linuxAppReleaseLabelText: Release value of the RPM <name>.spec file or Debian revision value of the DEB control file:
UnixOptionsPanel.linuxMenuGroupLabelText: Menu group this application is placed in:
UnixOptionsPanel.linuxPackageDepsLabelText: Required packages or capabilities for the application:
UnixOptionsPanel.linuxShortcutLabelText: Creates a shortcut for the application:

WindowsOptionsPanel.winDirChooserLabelText: Allow the user to choose a directory in which the product is installed:
WindowsOptionsPanel.winHelpUrlLabelText: URL where user can obtain further information or support:
WindowsOptionsPanel.winMenuGroupLabelText: Start Menu group this application is placed in:
WindowsOptionsPanel.winMenuLabelText: Request to add a Start Menu shortcut for this application:
WindowsOptionsPanel.winPerUserInstallLabelText: Request to perform an install on a per-user basis:
WindowsOptionsPanel.winShortcutLabelText: Request to create a desktop shortcut for this application:
WindowsOptionsPanel.winShortcutPromptLabelText: Allow the user to choose if shortcuts will be created by installer:
WindowsOptionsPanel.winUpdateUrlLabelText: URL of available application update information:
WindowsOptionsPanel.winUpgradeUuidLabelText: UUID associated with upgrades for this package:
